headline: Show HN: Flurri – Build meaningful connections with your co-workers
description:
Hi HN, we're Nikhil and Dhurv, founders of Flurri (https://www.flurriapp.com/icycle). We’re very excited to launch Flurri (www.flurriapp.com/icycle), a platform to help teams build meaningful connections and create an inclusive, engaging culture.

From our own experiences and countless others, we know that starting in a new team can be isolating and remote work is lonely. However, the workplace is a great place to make new connections and build bonds, especially as other community institutions (sports clubs, volunteering, etc.) have declined in prominence.

We wanted to make it easier and more comfortable to get to know your colleagues, focusing on what makes us all human! We capture a bit about your hobbies and interests, and provide a way for you to search against it, learning more about your co-workers in the process.

Communities create profiles built on hobbies, interests, and short ice breakers and we create a searchable internal database of employees based on hobbies, interests, etc. Additionally, users can set up Icycle, our product to match co-workers based on mutual interests on a regular cadence, with meeting invites sent directly.

We are completely free to use, so feel free to jump in - creating a profile takes 5 min!

We believe work is a great place to find your community, and we want to make it simple, easy, and fun to do that. We appreciate your support and feedback and look forward to hearing your thoughts as we continue to build!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Flurri - 与你的同事们建立有意义的联系
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Flurri - 與你的同事們建立有意義的聯繫
description_zh-Hans:
Hi HN，我们是Nikhil和Dhurv，Flurri（https://www.flurriapp.com/icycle）的创始人。我们非常高兴地推出Flurri（www.flurriapp.com/icycle），这是一个帮助团队建立有意义的联系并创造一个包容的、有吸引力的文化的平台。

从我们自己和无数人的经历来看，我们知道在一个新的团队开始工作可能是孤立的，远程工作是孤独的。然而，工作场所是建立新的联系和纽带的好地方，特别是在其他社区机构（体育俱乐部、志愿服务等）的地位下降的情况下。

我们想让你更容易和更舒适地了解你的同事，重点是使我们都成为人类的东西！

我们捕捉了一些关于你的爱好的信息。我们捕捉了一些关于你的爱好和兴趣，并为你提供了一种对照搜索的方式，在这个过程中了解你的同事。

社区创建了基于爱好、兴趣和简短破冰的档案，我们根据爱好、兴趣等建立了一个可搜索的员工内部数据库。此外，用户可以设置我们的产品Icycle，根据共同的兴趣定期匹配同事，并直接发送会议邀请。

我们完全免费使用，所以请随意加入--创建一个档案只需5分钟！

我们相信工作是一个寻找社区的好地方，我们希望使之简单、容易和有趣。我们感谢您的支持和反馈，并期待着在我们继续建设时听到您的想法
